title: Ajith Kumar KK takes charge as MD & CEO of Dhanlaxmi Bank, succeeding JK Shivan
description: Ajith Kumar KK appointed as MD & CEO at Dhanlaxmi Bank, replacing JK Shivan. He brings 36 years of banking experience from Federal Bank, including HR and credit roles.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
